text: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ تَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translation.en.sahih: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
translation.id.indonesian: Dia menciptakan langit dan bumi dengan hak. Maha Tinggi Allah daripada apa yang mereka persekutukan.
